pr_title: Various improvements to seednode service / install scripts

timeline.message: Require bitcoin.service from bisq-seednode.service via systemd binding
Require bitcoin.service from bisq-seednode.service via systemd binding
Require bitcoin.service from bisq-seednode.service via systemd binding
Make seednode installer run from master and build bisq from release tag
Split seednode systemd service ExecStart command into multiple lines
Add setting in seednode configuration to specify btcnode host/port
Tweak seednode torrc configuration options to improve P2P connectivity
Require bitcoin.service from bisq-seednode.service via systemd binding
Make seednode installer run from master and build bisq from release tag
Seednode must be shutdown using `kill -9` until #3884 is fixed
Seednode must be shutdown using `kill -9` until #3884 is fixed
Fix seednode uninstall script to use correct service names
Fix seednode uninstall script to use correct service names
Disable CircuitBuildTimeout in seednode Tor configuration

timeline.bodyText: @wiz  As I saw some messages in the explorer channel regarding tor settings. Is this torrc configuration still final?
timeline.author: ripcurlx
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,18 @@
-SOCKSPort 9050 # Default: Bind to localhost:9050 for local connections.
-Log notice syslog
 RunAsDaemon 1
+SOCKSPort 9050
 ControlPort 9051
+Log notice syslog
+
 CookieAuthentication 1
 CookieAuthFileGroupReadable 1
 DataDirectoryGroupReadable 1
-KeepalivePeriod 42
+
+SafeSocks 0
+HiddenServiceStatistics 0
+AvoidDiskWrites 1
+
+MaxClientCircuitsPending 64
+KeepalivePeriod 2
+#CircuitBuildTimeout 5
+#NewCircuitPeriod 15
+#NumEntryGuards 8

replies.bodyText: Okay yeah I just pushed a commit which comments out the advanced settings for now, I will address this in a separate PR
replies.author: wiz

timeline.message: Disable seednode torrc advanced configuration options for now
